derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from French philanthropique, from Greek philanthrōpos 'man-loving' (see philanthrope)

entry.def: A philanthropic person or organization freely gives money or other help to people who need it.

example.ex: Some of the best services for the ageing are sponsored by philanthropic organizations.
example.tran: 一些一流老人服务机构是由慈善组织资助的。

means.word_mean: 1. generous in assistance to the poor;
2. of or relating to or characterized by philanthropy;
